overview: Don Lázaro is a former gunslinger that has left behind his years of violence to care for his granddaughter, Beatriz. The child suffers a terminal disease and doesn’t have much hope to live. Lázaro is visited by a former friend for an appointment that will decide Beatriz’ future.
tagline: Lázaro attends an overdue appointment that will decide the future of his grand-daughter
title: A la hora marcada
